name: Midnight Oud
description: A deep, resinous oud wrapped in warm amber and a trace of saffron—magnetic and long-lasting.

name: Citrus Noir
description: Bright grapefruit cuts through smoky vetiver and dry cedar for a crisp, modern contrast.

name: Amber Velvet
description: Silky vanilla and plush amber glide over toasted tonka—a comforting embrace with presence.

name: Blue Steel
description: Clean marine breeze meets zesty bergamot and cool musks for an effortless daily signature.

name: Rose Smoke
description: A dark rose veiled in incense, grounded by earthy patchouli—romantic with an edge.

name: White Musk
description: Feather-light musks and soft iris for a clean, minimalist aura—perfect for everyday wear.
